trans-unit.source:
\n

An expression that provides runtime read/write permission for variables.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The variables or parameters to which to provide runtime access.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The read-only collection containing parameters that will be provided the runtime access.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx$ xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
